artifact.content: Use Case Number: UC1 Name: Customer Make Call Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Caller picks up the phone and dials a 4-digit number. The phone number is the input. System: The phone systems of the caller and callee and the server that processes the connection. Actors: Caller, callee Overview: This use case captures the process of making a call.

Use Case Number: UC2 Name: Customer Receive Call Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Callee picks up the phone when the phone is ringing. System: The phone systems of the caller and callee and the server that processes the connection. Actors: Caller, callee Overview: This use case captures the process of receiving a call.

Use Case Number: UC3 Name: Customer Setup Speed Dial Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Customer picks up the phone and dial to setup a number as speed dial System: The phone system of the caller and the server that processes the call. Actors: Caller Overview: This use case captures the process of which a customer wants to set up the certain numbers as speed dial.

Use Case Number: UC4 Name: Administrator Starts, Login, and Shutdown the System Console Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator starts the system console, login, and shut down the system console System: The system console Actors: Administrator Overview: This use case captures the process of which administrator starts, login, and shut down the system console user interface.

Use Case Number: UC5 Name: Administrator Managing Customer Accounts Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator selects in system console to manage customer accounts System: The server and system console Actors: Administrator Overview: This use case captures the process of which administrator managing customer accounts in the system

Use Case Number: UC6 Name: Administrator Setup Call Filter for Customer Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator selects in system console to setup call filter for certain customer System: System and system console Actors: Administrator Overview: This use case captures the process of administrator setting up call filter for certain customer

Use Case Number: UC7 Name: Administrator Change Bill Plan of Customer Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator selects in system console to change a customer�s bill plan System: The server and system console Actors: Administrator Overview: This use case captures the process of which administrator changes the bill plan of a customer

Use Case Number: UC8 Name: Administrator Request Display Customer Bill Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator selects in system console to display current bill of customer System: The server and system console Actors: Administrator Overview: This use case captures the process of administrator requesting to display the current bill of particular customer

Use Case Number: UC9 Name: Administrator Record Customer Bill Payment Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator selects in system console to record payment System: The server and system console Actors: Administrator Overview: This use case captures the process of administrator recording a bill payment

Use Case Number: UC10 Name: Administrator Search Customer Information Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator selects search for customer in system console System: The server and system console Actors: Administrator Overview: This use case captures the process of the administrator performing customer searches in the system

Use Case Number: UC11 Name: Administrator Managing Billing Plans Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator selects in system console to manage billing plans System: The server and system console Actors: Administrator Overview: This use case captures the process of administrator managing the bill plans in the system

Use Case Number: UC12 Name: Administrator Managing Phone Hardware/Software Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator selects in system console to manage phone hardware/software System: The server, system console and phone systems Actors: Administrator Overview: This use case captures the process of which administrator managing the hardware and software of the phone subsystems

Use Case Number: UC13 Name: Administrator Request Display System Status Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator selects in system console to request displaying the current system status System: The server, system console and phone systems Actors: Administrator Overview: This use case captures the process of which administrator requesting to display the current system status

Use Case Number: UC14 Name: Administrator Change Max System Load Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator selects in system console to change maximum number of calls allowed concurrently System: The server and system console Actors: Administrators Overview: This use case captures the process of changing the maximum number of calls allowed concurrently

Use Case Number: UC15 Name: Administrator Managing System Resources Authors: M1, M2, M3, M4 Event: Administrator selects in system console to manage system resources System: The server, system console, and phone subsystem Actors: Administrators Overview: This use case captures the process of assigning managing system resources
